Class Follower

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
      • Follower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Attackable, Trait

    public final class Follower
extends Card
implements Attackable, Trait
    The class represents a follower object with all its attributes and actions. It is only to be created through CardLib.getCard(String).

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Follower

        Follower(java.lang.String nme,
         java.lang.String lead,
         int cst,
         java.lang.String rar,
         java.awt.Image handImg,
         java.awt.Image fieldImg,
         java.lang.String swordTrait,
         int hp,
         int atk,
         int evolvedHpAdd,
         int evolvedAtkAdd,
         java.awt.Image evoImg,
         java.lang.String defaultAttackStatus,
         boolean bane,
         boolean ward,
         boolean drain,
         boolean ambush,
         boolean untargetable,
         java.lang.String efx,
         boolean hasSpellBoost)
        The constructor initializes all default attributes for a follower instance
        Parameters:
        nme - name
        lead - leader
        cst - cost
        rar - rarity
        handImg - image when the follower is in hand
        fieldImg - image when the follower is on field
        swordTrait - follower's swordcraft trait
        hp - health
        atk - attack
        evolvedHpAdd - the health increase upon evolving
        evolvedAtkAdd - the attack increase upon evolving
        evoImg - follower's image after evolving
        defaultAttackStatus - follower's default attack status
        bane - true if the follower has BANE effect
        ward - true if the follower has WARD effect
        drain - true if the follower has DRAIN effect
        ambush - true if the follower has AMBUSH effect
        untargetable - true if the follower has UNTARGETABLE effect
        efx - the effect string for the follower, it is encoded and only to be interpreted by EffectLib
        hasSpellBoost - true if the follower has spellboost effect
        See Also:
        Trait.SwordCraftTrait, AttackStatus, Follower.SimpleEffects

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public void attack(Follower enemy)
        Attack an enemy follower. Damage dealt to enemy follower equals the current attack value. Counterattack damage received equals to enemy follower's current attack value.

        This method does not check if the follower's atkStatus is valid for attacking. Therefore, it is mandatory to perform such check by calling AttackStatus.canAttackFollower() before invoking this method.

        If this follower is currently under Follower.SimpleEffects.AMBUSH, this status will be removed after attacking.

        Parameters:
        enemy - the enemy follower to attack

      • attack

        public void attack(Leader opponent)
        Attack enemy leader. Damage dealt to enemy leader equals the current attack value.

        This method does not check if the follower's atkStatus is valid for attacking. Therefore, it is mandatory to perform such check by calling AttackStatus.canAttackLeader() before invoking this method.

        If this follower is currently under Follower.SimpleEffects.AMBUSH, this status will be removed after attacking.

        Parameters:
        opponent - the enemy leader to attack

      • buff

        public void buff(int atk,
                 int hp,
                 Card sourceCard)
        Increases the follower's current attack and health by a specified amount, then add this buff action to the follower's buff log
        Parameters:
        atk - attack to be increased
        hp - health to be increased
        sourceCard - the card that gives this buff

      • evolve

        public void evolve()
        Evolve the current follower. Its attack and health will increase according to its evoAtkAdd and evoHpAdd, and it will gain AttackStatus.RUSH if it just entered field. One follower is only allowed to be evolved once.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the follower has already been evolved

      • getAtkStatus

        public AttackStatus getAtkStatus()
        Returns:
        the current attack status of the follower

      • getAttack

        public int getAttack()
        Returns:
        the current attack value of the follower

      • getBuffListString

        public java.lang.String getBuffListString()
        Returns:
        a string contains all buffs' descriptions that the current follower has received

      • getEvolvedImage

        the image of the follower after evolving

      • grantSimpleEffect

        public void grantSimpleEffect(Follower.SimpleEffects simpleEffect)
        Grant this follower a simple effect.

        All modifications related to the follower's atkStatus will not be valid if the current status is AttackStatus.DISABLED. Follower.SimpleEffects.RUSH will not override AttackStatus.STORM. Besides, this method will override AttackStatus.ATTACKED, which means granting either Follower.SimpleEffects.STORM or Follower.SimpleEffects.RUSH will allow this follower to attack even if it has already attacked this round.

        Parameters:
        simpleEffect - the simple effect to be granted
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the simple effect does not exist
        See Also:
        Follower.SimpleEffects, AttackStatus

      • hasAmbush

        public boolean hasAmbush()
        Returns:

      • heal

        public void heal(int heal)
        Heal the follower for a certain amount of health. There is no limit for health value, so it can exceed follower's original health.
        Specified by:
        heal in interface Attackable
        Parameters:
        heal - the amount of health to be healed

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        Description copied from class: Card
        This method is to be implemented by all kinds of cards to indicate whether the card is alive or not.

        Specified by:
        isAlive in class Card
        Returns:
        true if the follower is alive, false otherwise

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Instantly kills the follower by reducing the health to 0

      • revokeSimpleEffect

        public void revokeSimpleEffect(Follower.SimpleEffects simpleEffects)
        Revoke a simple effect from this follower

        Only temporary effects are allowed to be removed.

        Parameters:
        simpleEffects - the simple effect to be revoked
        See Also:
        Follower.SimpleEffects

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(Follower attacker)
        Follower takes damage from an enemy follower. The damage taken is equal to the enemy follower's attack. If the follower has damage immune effect, no damage will be taken.
        Specified by:
        takeDamage in interface Attackable
        Parameters:
        attacker - the attacker follower

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(int damage)
        Follower takes a specific amount of damage unless it has damage immune.
        Specified by:
        takeDamage in interface Attackable
        Parameters:
        damage - the amount of damage to be taken
